Package com.burstly.lib.ui

Package contains BurstlyView components that houses every Ad type.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
IBurstlyAdListener This interface is used to get ad receiving callbacks from BurstlyView.
IBurstlyRichMedia This interface describes rich media possibilities that are supported by Burstly.
IErrorAndStateListener Used for last error and state notifications.
 

Class Summary
AdRequestCallback Class implements callback for request tasks.
AdSize Class incapsulated BurstlyView size.
BurstlyView This is main container for displaying all ads in.
BurstlyViewConfigurator Extracts and configures BurstlyView instance based on xml layout properties.
 

Enum Summary
BurstlyViewState Represents all possible view states.
LastBurstlyError Represents all possible burstly related errors.
 

Package com.burstly.lib.ui Description

Package contains BurstlyView components that houses every Ad type. This is the main UI component.

Since:
1.0
